alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 3:38AM CDT until June 14 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Central Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Adair County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 338 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cincinnati to 4 miles southwest of Lincoln, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Lowell... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... Tontitown... West Fork... Lincoln... Westville... Greenland... Cincinnati... Drake Field Airport... Johnson... Elm Springs... Walnut Grove... Savoy... Wedington... Rhea... Canehill... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 51 and 78. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
